tags: fame fate and the first kiss
summary: Caitsbooks November Wrap Up! I read 10 books this month, and it was definitely a struggle to keep my reading speed while doing...
caption:
Caitsbooks November Wrap Up!

I read 10 books this month, and it was definitely a struggle to keep my reading speed while doing NaNoWriMo. I’m just glad I managed to reach 10 with the help of a few novellas. Plus, now I’ve written my own book. That should count for something!

Bold titles have reviews, click the ratings to check them out!

  1. Kingdom of Ash by Sarah J. Maas || 5/5 Stars
    I can’t believe this series is over. As I’ve grown with these books, so has my reading tastes, but I still have a special place in my heart for Throne of Glass. I know it’s controversial, and has some problematic elements, but it still is special to me.
  2. Now a Major Motion Picture by Cori McCarthy || 3/5 Stars
    This book was just meh. It was lighthearted and cute, but I didn’t find myself falling in love with it like I wanted to.
  3. Fame, Fate, & The First Kiss (ARC) by Kasie West || 4/5 Stars
    Kasie West never fails to bring me joy with her books. This one will be published in February 2019, and I’m so excited for more people to read it. It’s just so much fun!
  4. Rules of Attraction by Simone Elkeles || 3.5/5 Stars
    I loved Perfect Chemistry when I read it back in 2015(?). Since then, I’ve been wanting to continue the series but I’ve been putting it off. I must have put it off a little too long because now my reading tastes are different and it just wasn’t as good of a read for me as Perfect Chemistry was.
  5. Umbertouched by Livia Blackburne || 5/5 Stars
    This book. Rosemarked really took me by surprise this year, and while I was prepared to love Umbertouched, I didn’t expect it to be such a fantastic finale! And now because of it, I’m in a massive reading slump that’s lasted almost three weeks.
  6. Dumplin’ by Julie Murphy || 4/5 Stars
    Dumplin’ was good, and I enjoyed it. The hype surrounding it kinda made it a little disappointing, but I’m still super excited to see the movie on Netflix and watch this story unfold on the screen.
  7. We Can Be Mended by Veronica Roth || 3/5 Stars
    While logistically speaking, this is a good novella and what occurs in it makes sense, I still was left unsatisfied. After Allegiant– a book that bothers me for dozens of reasons– I was hoping this novella would make me feel a little better, especially with years of distance between me and that series. It didn’t. Now I’m just bitter all over again.
  8. The Favorite by Kiera Cass || 4.5/5 Stars
    I really enjoyed going back into the world of The Selection. It may not be the best series in the universe, but I loved it when I first read it in 2014-2015. And now I can say I still love it.
  9. The Epilogue by Kiera Cass || 4/5 Stars
    I continued on my The Selection binge. And this cute novella was absolutely adorable and just very happy.
  10. The Maid by Kiera Cass || 3/5 Stars
    And now to the end of my The Selection novella marathon. I wished this one was a little bit longer, either starting earlier in the story or continuing to later.

What books did you read in November? 

Also, check out:
-Last Month’s Wrap Up-
-Top 5 Most Anticipated December Releases-
-My December TBR-

blog.name: hiddelstan
blog.title: Fire Breathing Bitch Queen
blog.description: I repost a lot of shit about books,movies tv shows and my favourite actors, if you think you’ll like them then follow

body:
Canon

(contains spoilers for Kingdom of ash)

That Aelin and Rowan in about 10 to 20 years, will decide that they want to thank that stranger who helped out Aelin when she was going through worlds, aka Rhys, and when they do they’ll take Aedion Fenrys and Lysandra with them to present a court, you know, to be civilised, anyway so they get there and they meet Feyre and Rhys(who are with a child!!!),so at first they try to give them money cause they don’t know that they’re rich af but Rhys and Feyre just laughed and told them that they’re the high lord and lady of the night court, so Rhys welcomes them with open arms,(and of course word goes around that the high lord and lady are housing very important people!! The people are calling them out of this world!!!!literally).

So they stay in their house, and they tell them all about their world and why exactly was Aelin hurled literally through worlds, also they tell them about the horrors and the things they’ve endured and in return Rhys starts to tell them about what they had to endure, and how he and his family have found each other, and how he found Feyre, who is the light of his life, and just basically retelling they’re life stories.

So in the end Rhys would want to introduce these new friends to his family, and Cassian and Aedion got really really competitive with each other(but they secretly like each other) and Cassian staied up all night and got pissy with Aedion and they swapped war stories, and how they honourly defend their home, like for hours, and Cassian bragged about how he has 7 siphons to hold back his power but Aedion only said that in a hand to hand combat Aedion would nail Cassian, so they decided to fight-drunkenly May I add- which Aelin at that point called them territorial fae bastards ,so they ended up laughing and decided that they’re both equally strong*wink wink*.

As for Mor she connected to Fenrys, and he was flirting the hell outat first, until She told him that she was not interested, so he decided to be friends with her, and boy their friendship was dirty as hell, they constantly made dirty comments about everyone and about each other and they adviced everyone on how to dress better(which they’ve decided that they’re the only worthy people to decide who wears what and what’s best for everyone).

Also did I tell you that Lysandra and Azriel became the bestest of friends? Yeah , Azriel really loved Lysandra‘ many skins and was just fascinated with how fast she can change from one form to another, also she was at aww with Azriel’s bats and she tried to transform and make bats of her own, which she ended up successfully doing and everyone marvelled over how beautiful and accurate they are.

Also I don’t need to tell you how much Sass was going around from Aelin and Rhys, these two became the fastest friends, and they pissed each other off easily (from who has a better style to who has a better world ,of course after 10-20 years of rebuilding), and Feyre and Rowan sat aside and just watched their dork mates be idiots and just loved their life.

In the end when it’s time to leave, everyone is so bummed out that they had to leave, and Cass would not admit it, but he shed a tear secretly! also Mor had so much gifts for them it was unbelievable, but as a special gift Aelin gave them a little bit of her fire, a small dosage that will burn forever as a sign of her gratitude, for someone who helped out a stranger go home when they were lost the most. Also Feyre as their parting gift gave them a canvas that had a scenery of what she imagined their world looked like, velaris and a portal between these two worlds,to remind them that they’re not alone, and that they survived the war and are now living a happy beautiful life with their loved ones.

So they said their goodbyes and Aelin hugged Rhys tightly and told him thank you, and Feyre hugged Aelin, and told her that they have a second home here in velaris and that they should visit whenever, and she also promised them that they’d visit Terrsan(but since they don’t know how to open portals of course either Aelin or Rowan would come and get them;)), also Aedion hugged Cassian tightly and told him that hes stronger in his ear at which Cassian laughed and slapped his arm and told him it was very nice knowing him, also Lysandra said goodbyes to Azriel and transformed one last time for him. As for Fenrys and Mor they sobbed in each other’s arm and just made promises that they’ll visit and they’ll try their best to keep their court In style and that they’ll always remember this trip and that it was like a dream. So without turning around everyone went through the portal and went home to Terssan, and everyone knew that for however long they lived they’ll always have a home in velaris and will always remember a stranger’s hand that guided them and their queen through the dark.

The end.

reblog.comment:
Canon

(contains spoilers for Kingdom of ash)

That Aelin and Rowan in about 10 to 20 years, will decide that they want to thank that stranger who helped out Aelin when she was going through worlds, aka Rhys, and when they do they’ll take Aedion Fenrys and Lysandra with them to present a court, you know, to be civilised, anyway so they get there and they meet Feyre and Rhys(who are with a child!!!),so at first they try to give them money cause they don’t know that they’re rich af but Rhys and Feyre just laughed and told them that they’re the high lord and lady of the night court, so Rhys welcomes them with open arms,(and of course word goes around that the high lord and lady are housing very important people!! The people are calling them out of this world!!!!literally).

So they stay in their house, and they tell them all about their world and why exactly was Aelin hurled literally through worlds, also they tell them about the horrors and the things they’ve endured and in return Rhys starts to tell them about what they had to endure, and how he and his family have found each other, and how he found Feyre, who is the light of his life, and just basically retelling they’re life stories.

So in the end Rhys would want to introduce these new friends to his family, and Cassian and Aedion got really really competitive with each other(but they secretly like each other) and Cassian staied up all night and got pissy with Aedion and they swapped war stories, and how they honourly defend their home, like for hours, and Cassian bragged about how he has 7 siphons to hold back his power but Aedion only said that in a hand to hand combat Aedion would nail Cassian, so they decided to fight-drunkenly May I add- which Aelin at that point called them territorial fae bastards ,so they ended up laughing and decided that they’re both equally strong*wink wink*.

As for Mor she connected to Fenrys, and he was flirting the hell outat first, until She told him that she was not interested, so he decided to be friends with her, and boy their friendship was dirty as hell, they constantly made dirty comments about everyone and about each other and they adviced everyone on how to dress better(which they’ve decided that they’re the only worthy people to decide who wears what and what’s best for everyone).

Also did I tell you that Lysandra and Azriel became the bestest of friends? Yeah , Azriel really loved Lysandra‘ many skins and was just fascinated with how fast she can change from one form to another, also she was at aww with Azriel’s bats and she tried to transform and make bats of her own, which she ended up successfully doing and everyone marvelled over how beautiful and accurate they are.

Also I don’t need to tell you how much Sass was going around from Aelin and Rhys, these two became the fastest friends, and they pissed each other off easily (from who has a better style to who has a better world ,of course after 10-20 years of rebuilding), and Feyre and Rowan sat aside and just watched their dork mates be idiots and just loved their life.

In the end when it’s time to leave, everyone is so bummed out that they had to leave, and Cass would not admit it, but he shed a tear secretly! also Mor had so much gifts for them it was unbelievable, but as a special gift Aelin gave them a little bit of her fire, a small dosage that will burn forever as a sign of her gratitude, for someone who helped out a stranger go home when they were lost the most. Also Feyre as their parting gift gave them a canvas that had a scenery of what she imagined their world looked like, velaris and a portal between these two worlds,to remind them that they’re not alone, and that they survived the war and are now living a happy beautiful life with their loved ones.

So they said their goodbyes and Aelin hugged Rhys tightly and told him thank you, and Feyre hugged Aelin, and told her that they have a second home here in velaris and that they should visit whenever, and she also promised them that they’d visit Terrsan(but since they don’t know how to open portals of course either Aelin or Rowan would come and get them;)), also Aedion hugged Cassian tightly and told him that hes stronger in his ear at which Cassian laughed and slapped his arm and told him it was very nice knowing him, also Lysandra said goodbyes to Azriel and transformed one last time for him. As for Fenrys and Mor they sobbed in each other’s arm and just made promises that they’ll visit and they’ll try their best to keep their court In style and that they’ll always remember this trip and that it was like a dream. So without turning around everyone went through the portal and went home to Terssan, and everyone knew that for however long they lived they’ll always have a home in velaris and will always remember a stranger’s hand that guided them and their queen through the dark.

The end.

blog.description: books- The Cruel Prince/Grishaverse/stuff by SJM/occasional Twilight (i'm sorry). t.v- mostly CW/Netflix shit. some shitty memes and opinions on social issues/politics. NOT SPOILER FREE. it is always an ok time to send me an ask. enjoy the chaos~

summary:
"Ressina asked, 'So what are you going to do with it? The studio.'
I surveyed the empty space before me. Not empty- waiting.
And...
body:
“Ressina asked, ‘So what are you going to do with it? The studio.’

I surveyed the empty space before me. Not empty- waiting.

And from far away, as if it was carryied on the cold wind, I heard the Suriel’s voice.

Feyre Archeron, a request. Leave this world a better place than how you found it.

I swallowed down my tears, and brushed a stray strand of hair back into my braid before I turned to the faerie. 'You wouldn’t be looking for a wholly inexperienced business partner, would you?’”

I REALLY NEED YOU TO FUCKING UNDERSTAND HOW DEEPLY THIS MADE MY HEART ACHE

blog.description:
My name is Lyanndra.

PROFESSIONAL FANGIRL

Bibliophile. Writer. Movie and TV Show Addict. Emotionally attached to a bunch of fictional characters.

Loves:. BOOKS. TV Shows. Movies. Writing. Music. Multifandoms. Cats and Dogs. Quirky Vintage Stuff. Anything owl-related. Yogurt.

Do you ever wonder whether people would like you more or less if they could see inside you?

2017 Reading Challenge

Lyanndra has read 15 books toward their goal of 30 books.

summary: l’m stuck in a post-SJM reading rut.
body:
l’m stuck in a post-SJM reading rut.

i literally haven’t been able to read anything except ACOTAR/TOG. MULTIPLE TIMES, YOU GUYS. What should I read to help me get outta this? I have like 10 books I’ve purchased but I don’t know what to read that’ll hold my attention. PLS HELP.
